name: Cooking Games for Fun
description:
Fresh from the oven, Cooking for Girls is here. Ever wanted to cook mouthwatering delicacies all by yourself? Well, then you have a great chance to show off your cooking skills with this super app. Make Burgers, Ice Creams, Cakes, Pizzas, Sandwiches, Cupcakes, Pastries and Donuts and show off your creative culinary skills.

Young girls can get their hands on ten different foods: Burger, two types of Ice Cream, Sandwich, two types of Cake, Pizza, Donut, Pastry and Cupcake. Make your imagination and creativity go crazy to make the most sumptuous and appetizing food. A variety of fillings, veggies, toppings and ingredients make the app a tasty treat all the way.

Play around with the ingredients and make your very own meal today. Flaunt your cooking to your friends by saving your creation on your phone as an image and share it on Facebook, Twitter, Email.

Features:
* 10 food items to choose from: Burger, 2 types of Ice Cream, Sandwich, 2 types of Cake, Pizza, Donut, Pastry and Cupcake.
* Save and share your creations.
* Loads of options and ingredients available.

A fun and exciting way to cook some of your all time favorite food items! Get out the apron with this app today!
